About Me

Samantha Holmes

Full Stack Developer

I am a full stack developer with a passion to make innovative and meaningful things. I thrive on solving problems and constantly improving myself and my work. I look forward to challenging myself in a firm where I can grow and be a part of a great team.

Portfolio

MakeTogether

A social media platform for web designers and web developers to meet each other, post projects they are seeking collaborators on, and have conversations.

2048 Clone

A replica of the iOS game from KetchApp. Written in JavaScript.

LES Film Festival

A mock app of a film festival site where users, judges, and admins can sign up, vote, leave reviews, and comments.
